product_name: CliniqueFresh Pressed Renewing Powder Cleanser with Pure Vitamin C
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Fresh Pressed Powder Cleanser is a water-activated powder cleanser with fresh Vitamin C to purify, brighten, retexturize.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Ultrafine powder activates with water for an exhilarating cleansing experience.Instantly, skin is awakened, purified, with a refined texture and brighter look.Non-drying formula is gentle enough for use each morning.Preps skin for treatment with Clinique Fresh Pressed Daily Booster with Pure Vitamin C 10%.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESFragranceItem 2506735How To UseUse in AM to jump-start skin's natural cellular renewal process.Pour powder into wet hand.Add water and work into lather.Gently massage over skin, avoiding eye area.Leave on for 1 minute to capture the potency of pure Vitamin C.Rinse well.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Ascorbic Acid, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Acetyl Glucosamine, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Morus Nigra (Mulberry) Root Extract, Molasses Extract\Saccharum Officinarum\Extrait De MÃ©lasse, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Algae Extract, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Alcaligenes Polysaccharides, Caffeine, Sucrose, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\ProtÃ©ine Du Petit-Lait, Betaine, Salicylic Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Allyl Methacrylates Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, PEG-8, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use in AM to jump-start skin's natural cellular renewal process.Pour powder into wet hand.Add water and work into lather.Gently massage over skin, avoiding eye area.Leave on for 1 minute to capture the potency of pure Vitamin C.Rinse well.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: worth it when this is  on sale
reviews.comments: i have been using these twice weekly for several months. pro tip since there are only 28 applications in a box: cut packet in half, put half the powder in each half, then add 1/2 scoop of The Ordinary L-Acsorbic powder to DOUBLE the amount of product. it will still foam up.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser I have EVER used!
reviews.comments: This cleanser leaves my skin super clean with pores tightened.  It also helps with my cystic acne! Love the single use packaging too.

reviews.headline: #1 cleanser!
reviews.comments: I've been buying and using this cleanser for years and my skin has never looked better. This cleanser paired with the clinique vitamin c serum are my go to skin care products.

reviews.headline: Nice clean skin!
reviews.comments: My skin feels clean, smooth and brighter after using. Love the feel and look of my skin after using 30 days. Will reorder.

reviews.headline: Holy grail vitamin C
reviews.comments: This stuff WORKS. I'm 36F with sensitive, medium-toned skin and some darker acne scars, and I cannot overstate how drastically this has reduced my dark spots. I have tried serums, balms, sticks, spot treatments, basically every vitamin C product from pharmacy brands to expensive, luxury brands. Other products I've tried either irritated my skin or oxidized (turned orange and spoiled) within a week of opening the bottle. These little individual powder packets keep the ingredients from oxidizing and are v convenient for travel. 10/10, will buy again!

reviews.headline: These are keepers!
reviews.comments: These packets make my skin look and feel amazing! Great for traveling!  If needed, you can get by using half a packet per wash.

reviews.headline: I hope they don't discontinue this!!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser ! And the boosters i cant find the viramin a one

reviews.headline: Pricey & skeptical
reviews.comments:
After many failed attempts to clear up, re-texturize & correct the hyperpigmentation on my face (I'm 47) I bought this on the recommendation of the associate. It cost way more than I really wanted to spend but with their return policy I figured why not? I'm SO happy I bought this!! Within 1 week I started to see results! I've been using this now for about 3 weeks & my complexion has cleared up the pigmentation & all the other issues I had! 
The ONLY downside is it can dry your face a little bit. So get a good moisturizer too. (I use Gold Bond) Other then that I highly, highly recommend this product!!

reviews.headline: Love at first wash
reviews.comments: I'm in love with these. I bought originally for travel. Non liquid tsa approved. My skin on vacation with less products was actually in better shape! If cheaper I'd use everyday. I still use when not traveling a few times a week.

reviews.headline: Loving the glow!
reviews.comments: Literally 'sunshine in a sachet' for my face! I use one sachet every morning on lightly dampened skin. It mildly cleanses and therefore would be unsuitable for evening use and removing makeup, which is probably why the instructions state to use in the morning. I massage this into my skin for about 30 seconds and rinse off. Immediately there is a noticeable glow to my skin which I love, however I'm not so keen on the powder consistency - it's so fine that when you tear open the top of the sachet and pour into your palm, some of it disperses into the air, so best to hold away from you. The first time I opened one, even though level to my waist, I could actually taste some of the powder as I inhaled. Now I just hold my breath when opening as I don't think it's all that beneficial to ingest this stuff! But nevertheless a brilliant product...non-stripping or drying in any way, on my normal/combination skin type. The Vitamin C in this gives me a lovely glow and the Salicylic acid helps with skin texture so I'm getting the best of both worlds when I use this. -> My 'Ulta Beauty Top 7 must-have list' (My 7 favorite beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Ulta) < - < 1. Hair Loss Treatment: Divine Herbal Hair Oil < 2. Eye Cream: Clinique All about eyes < 3. Lip Gloss: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil < 4. Makeup Remover: Lancome Bi Facil < 5. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: Divine Herbal Facial Treatment Serum < 6. Eyeliner: Ulta Beauty Gel Eyeliner Pencil < 7. Moisturizer: 'Lush' â€“ Enzymion

reviews.headline: Noticeable!
reviews.comments: I stopped using this for a while, then I rediscovered my stash and began again. I really notice a difference, and I can't deny it this time! My skin is just brighter, and if you give it enough time, dark spots will brighten up. They won't disappear, this is a cleanser, not a laser, but makeup becomes easier to apply, less concealer is necessary. PLUS, I get 3 uses out of each packet; just pour about 1/3 in your palm, then fold up the packet and use it again. I know exposure to oxygen can lessen the effects, but this seems to work for me.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this vit c for my face

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It leave your skin clean and fresh. Have it in individual packs you can take it anywhere.

reviews.headline: Keep it easy
reviews.comments: Love this concept. Great product. Easy to use no fuss.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: This product makes my skin feel soft!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This wash has been better for my dark spots than any serum I have ever used. I got a two week sample of this product and I was hooked. My skin is very sensitive and it hasn't dried it out. Packaging is a pain but worth it. My skin has never been so bright and even toned.

reviews.headline: No difference
reviews.comments: I'm JELOUS of all these people commenting how awesome this product is, because I used it for a week and saw absolutely no difference on my skin :/ now it's abandoned on my cabinet because I'm frustrated.

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser
reviews.comments: This powder when activated with water turns into a rich creamy foam. My face feels refreshed and brighter. Love it!

reviews.headline: I love this stuff so far
reviews.comments: I am really enjoying this so far, it has dramatically improved my texture and doesn't aggravate my sensitive skin, will repurchase.

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: I've been getting hormonal breakouts and haven't been able to find a good combination of product. This has turned my skin around. I use the thyers toner and proactiv step 3, and Clinique moisture surge and my skin has never looked this great. Even in my 20's. I use one pack a day and split the product. A half a packet is good for one face wash. But seriously this has cleared my scars and given me skin were I don't have to wear make up. ðŸ™ðŸ¼

faceoff_positive.comments: I completely fell in love with this and I can say I have tried everything from Sunday Riley to murad this definitely will be my forever morning scrub. I haven't touched my murad lightner since I purchased this still use my luna oil. I have used the 28 packets and I'm on my second box. I did notice some dryness due to the Luna oil but other then that this will forever be in my regime. It gives you a instant glow and helps with acne scars you just have to be patient. Hopefully Clinique comes out with bigger packets since it only comes with 28. I haven't used the serum booster because I feel like this has done it for me. I had hormonal cyst acne and now I just see one or two due too Mother Nature but who can stop that.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is amazing

faceoff_negative.comments:
Disappointed that the ingredients listed are incorrect.  This is what it really is and I'll be looking for a better C product.  The first 3 are rather harsh cleansers, then clay, then C.
Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Kaolin, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sapindus Mukurossi Peel Extract, Salicylic Acid, Allyl Methacrylates Crosspolymer, Cyclodextrin, Coconut Acid, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride, Water\Aqua\Eau, Disodium EDTA.
